description: Configuration for logging to console or file.

console.description: Configuration for logging to the console.

level.description: Minimum level of log events to write to the console.

stderr-level.description: Log events at this level or above are redirected to standard error.

file.description: Configuration for logging to a rotating log file.

level.description: Minimum level of log events to write to file.

path.description: Path to the files to be logged. If this is set to `logs/log.txt`, logs on the form `logs/log[date].txt` will be created, depending on `rolling-interval`.

retention-limit.description: Maximum number of log files that are kept in the log folder

rolling-interval.description: Rolling interval for log files. Either `day` or `hour`

trace-listener.description: Adds a listener that uses the configured logger to output messages from `System.Diagnostics.Trace`

level.description: Level to output trace messages at
